pipisodes.title: Twinkle Twinkle
pipisodes.description: Practise rhyming and learn a song.
pipisodes.learning_objective: Practise rhyming and learn a song.

pipisodes.title: Old MacDonald
pipisodes.description: Learn about singing, rhyming and Old Macdonald's animals.
pipisodes.learning_objective: Learn about singing, rhyming and Old Macdonald's animals.

pipisodes.title: Ten green bottles
pipisodes.description: Sing along to the ten green bottles song
pipisodes.learning_objective: Sing along to the ten green bottles song

pipisodes.title: Badges
pipisodes.description: Understand about collecting letters and badges.
pipisodes.learning_objective: Understand about collecting letters and badges.

pipisodes.title: Gingerbread Man
pipisodes.description: Run as fast as you can!
pipisodes.learning_objective: Run as fast as you can!

pipisodes.title: The Ugly Duckling
pipisodes.description: Hear the wonderful story of the ugly duckling
pipisodes.learning_objective: Hear the wonderful story of the ugly duckling

pipisodes.title: Naughty Robot
pipisodes.description: 3d shapes. Time to half hour. 10 times table.
pipisodes.learning_objective: 3d shapes. Time to half hour. 10 times table.

pipisodes.title: Dogs
pipisodes.description: Learn about different breeds of dogs.
pipisodes.learning_objective: Learn about different breeds of dogs.

pipisodes.title: Chickens
pipisodes.description: Learn about chickens and odd and even numbers.
pipisodes.learning_objective: Learn about chickens and odd and even numbers.

pipisodes.title: Pigs
pipisodes.description: Learn about pigs and ten times table.
pipisodes.learning_objective: Learn about pigs and ten times table.

pipisodes.title: Buses
pipisodes.description: Practise counting up and down in groups of ten.
pipisodes.learning_objective: Practise counting up and down in groups of ten.

pipisodes.title: Houses of Parliament
pipisodes.description: Learn about the Houses of Parliament in London.
pipisodes.learning_objective: Learn about the Houses of Parliament in London.
